metadata.title: MEN launches 3 new brands in push for loyal audiences
metadata.description: The Manchester Evening News has launched three new local news brands to bring further depth to its award-winning coverage of the region. The Reach-owned title has hired a team of journalists who…
metadata.author: Behind Local News

metadata.title: Strengthening local journalism: 10 tips for newsrooms
metadata.description: Only 13% of Americans trust the media “a great deal,” and 28% “a fair amount,” a Gallup poll found last year, with 69% of Democrats, 15% of Republicans and 36% of independents saying they “trust media.” In an election year that type of political polarization may only increase.
metadata.author: Damian Radcliffe
